title: Uhh
body: Is this a joke? Or am I actually using the wrong link?

replies.body: Yeah the legacy client is gone, that was months ago, welcome back.

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7VqHw2EL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-25T23:49:01.114+0000)
>
> Yeah the legacy client is gone, that was months ago, welcome back.

shit.
I believe we never got that post on OCE, only NA and EUW did. Instead we got [this one](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/legacy-client-officially-retires).
